snippet: Chris Johnson, who leads the National League with a .337 batting average, hit a two-run homer for Atlanta.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Atlanta Braves beat Philadelphia Phillies, 3-1; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Johnson, who leads the National League with a .337 batting average, hit a two-run homer for Atlanta.

headline.main: Braves’ Medlen Wins Fourth Straight Start
